value:
$WmMPID_ハロクルトナーガ,ch11_23_Kurt_M_Halloween21,Face|A harvest festival in another world...
How exciting! The bustling crowds
are truly something to behold.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロソフィーヤ,ch02_04_Sofiya_F_Halloween21,Face|I find it all a bit overwhelming, to be
quite honest. My heart is racing from
both excitement and fear...$k$pSeeing so many people in one place
is a rare sight in Nabata.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロクルトナーガ,ch11_23_Kurt_M_Halloween21,Face|I was hardly ever allowed beyond
Goldoa's borders, and no one was
allowed in...so I know the feeling.$k$pI view this as a valuable learning
opportunity, a chance to experience
the outside world...$k$pThe more I know about the sorts
of people that live outside of Goldoa,
the better.$k$pWhat better way to do so than to
listen to the tales of those from
different worlds altogether?$k$p$WmMPID_ハロソフィーヤ,ch02_04_Sofiya_F_Halloween21,Face|I suppose you're right. And Fae does
insist on new bedtime stories from
time to time...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_ハロクルトナーガ,ch11_23_Kurt_M_Halloween21,Face|Hmm... What do you suppose that
woman over there is dressed as?$k$p$WmMPID_ハロソフィーヤ,ch02_04_Sofiya_F_Halloween21,Face|I can't say for sure, but she does
have an allure about her... I feel
almost drawn to her.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロレア,ch17_37_Rare_F_Halloween21,Face|...Might I be of some service?$k$p$WmMPID_ハロソフィーヤ,ch02_04_Sofiya_F_Halloween21,Face|Oh, no... Apologies. Please, pay
me no mind...$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_ハロレア,ch17_37_Rare_F_Halloween21,Face|Would you be willing to share tales
of your world with me? I will gladly
tell you of mine, of course.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロクルトナーガ,ch11_23_Kurt_M_Halloween21,Face|I would be delighted to! Shall we
find somewhere quiet and out of
the way, where we can talk?$k$p$Sbs150|
